sn1.48:1.1: The devatā Anathapiṇḍika: “This indeed is that Jeta’s Grove,
sn1.48:1.2: The resort of the Order of seers,
sn1.48:1.3: Dwelt in by the Dhamma King,
sn1.48:1.4: A place that gives me joy.
sn1.48:3.2: Out of regard for his own good,
sn1.48:3.4: Thus he is purified in it.
sn1.48:4.2: With virtue and with inner peace.
sn1.48:4.3: Even a bhikkhu who has gone beyond
sn1.48:4.4: At best can only equal him. ”
